description:
Amarok 3.0.1 is here a little over a month after Amarok 3.0 to add a couple of new features, including an option that lets users copy an image from the Wikipedia applet to the clipboard, along with a clickable notification if the user clicks on a non-Wikipedia link and the ability to indicate the active […]

The post Amarok 3.0.1 Open-Source Music Player Improves the Wikipedia Applet appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Amarok 3.0.1 Open-Source Music Player Improves the Wikipedia Applet

description:
Ubuntu Core 24 comes as a fully containerized variant of Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat), introducing a fully preemptible kernel to ensure time-bound responses and enable advanced real-time features out of the box on Ubuntu Certified Hardware from Canonical’s partners.

The post Canonical Releases Ubuntu Core 24 for IoT, Edge, and Embedded Devices appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Canonical Releases Ubuntu Core 24 for IoT, Edge, and Embedded Devices

description:
A few months back, CVE-2024-1086, a nasty use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel’s netfilter, was revealed. With a Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) score of 7.8, this bug, with the foundation for most Linux network firewall and Network Address Translation (NAT) programs, was a nasty little security hole. With it, Netfliter’s table component could be […]

The post Nasty Linux Bug, CVE-2024-1086, Is on the Loose appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Nasty Linux Bug, CVE-2024-1086, Is on the Loose

description:
Linux Mint’s Software Manager has been significantly improved with faster loading, instant window display, and secure Flatpak settings.

The post Linux Mint’s Software Manager Is Now Faster & Safer appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Mint’s Software Manager Is Now Faster & Safer

description:
Fedora FESCo grants an exception for shipping prebuilt macOS binaries to support Apple Silicon. Here’s more on that!

The post Fedora Approves Exception for macOS Binaries in Asahi-Installer appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fedora Approves Exception for macOS Binaries in Asahi-Installer
